items.headline: Intel agrees to 10% U.S. government stake. It may not be the last chip company to do so.
items.summary_en: Intel has agreed to the U.S. government taking a stake in it, President Donald Trump and the company announced Friday, capping an extraordinary chapter between the White House and the computer-chip maker.
